author: Athira M
title: COVID-19: Popular social media stars in Kerala release comic shorts on the lockdown
description: YouTube and TikTok stars from the state upload viral videos on life at home during the COVID-19 related lockdown in India
content: YouTube, Tiktok and social media stars from Kerala upload hilarious videos shot at their homes during the lockdown to slow the spread of COVID-19. Garnished with liberal doses of humour, these short films are click bait for netizens who can relate to the situ… [+6285 chars]
